content: slip 3 stitches to cable needle hold to front round 28 k7 p10 k7 p3 k6 p3 k to end knit 2 knit 3 from cable needle round 29 k4 3/2lc p6 3/2rc k4 p3 k6 p3 k to end notes change to double pointed needles when stitches no round 30 k9 p6 k9 p3 k6 p3 k to end longer fit comfortably on circular needle pay close round 31 k6 3/2plc p2 3/2prc k6 p3 twice k to end attention to cable instructions in each round if the technique has a p in it some of the stitches will be round 32 k6 p2 k3 p2 twice k6 p3 twice k to end purled round 33 k6 p2 3/1plc 3/1prc p2 k6 p3 twice k to end round 34 *k6 p3 repeat from * three more times k to end round 35 k6 p3 twice k6 p2 3/1prc 3/1plc p2 k to end hat round 36 k6 p3 twice k6 p2 k3 twice p2 k to end round 37 k6 p3 twice k6 3/2prc p2 3/2plc k to end co 126 sts pm and join in the round being careful not to round 38 k6 p3 twice k9 p6 k to end twist your stitches round 39 k6 p3 twice k4 3/2prc p6 3/2plc k to end round 1 *k6 p3 repeat from * three more times *k3 p3 repeat round 40 k6 p3 twice k7 p10 k to end from * to end round 41 k6 p3 twice k3 3/1prc p10 3/1plc k to end rnds 2-16 repeat round one 15 more times round 42 k6 p3 twice k6 p12 k to end round 17 k6 p2 3/1prc 3/1plc p2 k6 p3 twice k to end round 43 k6 p3 twice 3/3lc p12 3/3rc k to end round 18 k6 p2 k3 p2 twice k6 p3 twice k to end round 44 k6 p3 twice k6 p12 k to end round 19 k6 3/2prc p2 3/2plc k6 p3 twice k to end round 45 k6 p3 twice k3 3/1lc p10 3/1rc k to end round 20 k9 p6 k9 p3 k6 p3 k to end round 46 k6 p3 twice k7 p10 k to end complimentary pattern blue sky fibers round 82 k9 p6 k6 p6 k to end round 83 k9 p1 p2tog p3 k6 p1 p2tog p3 k7 k2tog k10 k2tog to end 77 sts round 84 k9 p5 k6 p5 k to end round 85 k9 p2tog p3 k6 p2tog p3 k6 k2tog k9 k2tog to end 70 sts round 86 k9 p4 k6 p4 k to end round 87 k8 ssk p3 k5 ssk p3 k5 k2tog k8 k2tog to end 63 sts round 88 k9 p3 k6 p3 k to end round 89 k7 k2tog p3 k4 k2tog p3 k4 k2tog k7 k2tog to end 56 sts round 90 k8 p3 k5 p3 k to end round 91 k6 k2tog p3 k3 k2tog p3 k3 k2tog k6 k2tog to end 49 sts round
